Posts.Content: I have 125 cc in the last 24 hours. I had three lymph nodes removed and a lumpectomy on June 30th 2010... I though the cc's would be lowered in a week...I was wrong...Glad i came on here, i thought it was not a normal occurrence.
Posts.Title: Can't seem to get rid of the Drains!

Posts.Content: I cut off all my hair today...
Posts.Title: I am BALD BABY!?!

Posts.Content: I start August 2... Please keep me posted on any symptoms or LACK Of them...You give me hope...
Posts.Title: first day in the chemo bay

Posts.Content: Heather, we only have 5 to go... Carkris, I am heeding your suggestions... I start TCH regimen on Monday...Today I can tell my taste buds are changing... I just rinsed with the Biotene mouthwash... I have been staying hydrating and resting... Honestly, I cannot decipher what side effects are from what medications... Overall, it is not as bad as I predicted...
Posts.Title: 1st Chemo 2 days ago!
